title: Update enabling Samsung Pay now hitting compatible Verizon phones
text:
Update enabling Samsung Pay now hitting compatible Verizon phones 
Published By: AndroidCentral.com - Today 
A mere 10 days after it announced support for the system, Verizon is rolling out updates to its latest Samsung devices that enable Samsung P...
